original_title: Eurozone business activity hits 15-month high in August | Euronews
article_summary: Eurozone economy gains momentum in August, with business activity growing at its fastest rate since May 2024, driven by manufacturing and new orders. The composite PMI increased to 51.1 points, suggesting a 0.2% quarterly GDP growth. However, the pace of expansion remains sluggish, according to S&P Global.</s>
